profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? All its data will be lost.

progress.pleaseWait: Please wait, this may take a moment...

home.heroSubtitle: Every tool you need to be productive. 100% local processing, zero data collection, fully open source.
home.noResultsHint: Try different keywords or check the spelling
home.videoToolsDesc: Compress, convert and process your video files with ease. Supports MP4, AVI, MKV and more.
home.imageToolsDesc: Optimize your images. Compress JPG, PNG, WEBP or convert between formats instantly.
home.pdfToolsDesc: Complete PDF solution. Merge, split, compress, organize and manage your PDF documents.
home.regexTesterDesc: Test and debug your regular expressions in real-time with visual highlighting.
home.unitConverterDesc: Convert between thousands of units. Length, weight, temperature, speed and more.
home.compressVideoDesc: Quickly reduce video file size without losing quality.
home.organizePdfDesc: Rearrange, delete or rotate pages in your PDF files.
home.convertImageDesc: Transform images to PNG, JPG, WEBP formats in seconds.

settings.title: Settings
settings.appearanceDesc: Customize the look and feel of the application
settings.description: TaskPlex is a powerful, modern, and open-source utility suite for processing Videos, Images, and PDFs.

hotkeys.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
hotkeys.description: Configure keyboard shortcuts for quick access to features

video.title: Video Processing
video.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select

videoToGif.title: Video to GIF
videoToGif.description: Create an optimized GIF from a segment of your video.
videoToGif.dragDrop: Drag and drop a video or click to upload

validation.fileRequired: Please select a video file first.

videoExtractAudio.title: Extract Audio
videoExtractAudio.description: Extract the audio track from your video and export to MP3, WAV, FLAC, or OGG.
videoExtractAudio.dragDrop: Drag and drop a video or click to upload

validation.fileRequired: Please select a video file first.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.description: Generate strong passwords with customizable options.
passwordGenerator.excludeAmbiguous: Exclude ambiguous characters (0, O, 1, l, I)

passwordChecker.title: Password Checker
passwordChecker.description: Check password strength and get suggestions to improve it.
passwordChecker.disclaimer: Disclaimer: this check does not use breach/dictionary lists; it only scores character variety and length.

fileEncryption.title: File Encryption
fileEncryption.dropFile: Drag and drop your file here or click to browse
fileEncryption.dropEncryptedFile: Drag and drop your encrypted file here or click to browse
fileEncryption.passwordHint: Use a strong password. You'll need it to decrypt the file.
fileEncryption.info1: Files are encrypted with AES-256, a secure encryption algorithm.
fileEncryption.info2: The password is required to decrypt the file. Lose it and you won't be able to access the file.

fileHash.title: File Hash
fileHash.dropFile: Drag and drop your file here or click to browse
fileHash.info1: A hash (checksum) is a unique fingerprint of a file.
fileHash.info2: Use it to verify file integrity or compare two files.
fileHash.info3: SHA256 is recommended for security, MD5 is faster but less secure.

uuidGenerator.title: UUID Generator
uuidGenerator.description: Generate UUID v4 identifiers in bulk.
uuidGenerator.placeholder: Generate UUIDs to see them here

urlEncoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
urlEncoder.description: Encode or decode URL strings safely.

image.title: Image Processing
image.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select

rotateImage.title: Rotate Image
rotateImage.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select

flipImage.title: Flip Image
flipImage.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select

imageToIcon.title: Create Icon
imageToIcon.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select

extractColors.title: Extract Colors
extractColors.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select
extractColors.palettePlaceholder: Upload an image and extract to see the palette

adjustImage.title: Adjust Image
adjustImage.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select

filterImage.title: Image Filters
filterImage.subtitle: Apply quick filters to your images.
filterImage.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select

createCollage.title: Create Collage
createCollage.subtitle: Arrange multiple images in a grid to create a collage.
createCollage.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select images
createCollage.clickToChange: Click on a cell to select its image

pdfToWord.title: PDF to Word
pdfToWord.subtitle: Convert your PDF into an editable DOCX (text only).
pdfToWord.dragDrop: Drag & drop or click to choose a PDF
pdfToWord.info: We extract text content and generate a DOCX file.
pdfToWord.note: Images and advanced formatting are not preserved.

wordToPdf.title: Word to PDF
wordToPdf.subtitle: Convert a DOCX to PDF quickly.
wordToPdf.dragDrop: Drag & drop or click to choose a DOCX
wordToPdf.info: We render text into a PDF document.
wordToPdf.note: Complex layouts may not be preserved; text-only rendering.

textFormatter.title: Format Text
textFormatter.subtitle: Replace literal \n sequences by real line breaks.
textFormatter.placeholder: Paste your text containing literal \n characters...

hashGenerator.title: Hash Generator
hashGenerator.subtitle: Generate hashes (MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512) and copy them.
hashGenerator.saltPlaceholder: Optional salt (prepended to text before hashing)

base64.title: Base64 Encode/Decode
base64.subtitle: Convert text to/from Base64 in one place.
base64.inputHintEncode: Paste plain text; it will be converted to Base64
base64.inputHintDecode: Paste Base64 text; it will be decoded below

base64Encode.title: Base64 Encoder
base64Encode.subtitle: Encode any text to Base64.
base64Encode.inputHint: Paste plain text; it will be converted to Base64

colorConverter.title: Color Converter
colorConverter.subtitle: Convert between HEX, RGB, HSL and CMYK. Pick a color or paste a value.
colorConverter.inputHelp: Accepts HEX (#fff or #ffffff), RGB, or HSL values

resizeImage.title: Resize Image
resizeImage.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select

rotateVideo.title: Rotate Video
rotateVideo.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select

pdf.title: PDF Tools
pdf.subtitle: Merge, split, compress, and organize your PDFs in just a few clicks.

compress.title: Compress PDF
compress.description: Reduce PDF file size while optimizing for maximal quality.

merge.title: Merge PDF
merge.description: Combine multiple PDFs into one unified document.

split.title: Split PDF
split.description: Extract pages from your PDF or save each page as a separate PDF.
split.allPagesDesc: Save every page as a separate PDF file

reorganize.title: Organize PDF
reorganize.description: Sort pages of your PDF file however you like. Delete PDF pages or add PDF pages to your document at will.
reorganize.dragDrop: Drag and drop pages to reorder

password.title: Password Protect PDF
password.description: Add or remove password protection from your PDF files
password.passwordHint: Choose a strong password to protect your PDF

ocr.title: OCR
ocr.languageHint: Select the language of the text in your PDF for better OCR accuracy

toImages.title: PDF to Images
toImages.description: Convert each page of your PDF to an image

imagesToPdf.title: Images to PDF
imagesToPdf.description: Convert multiple images into a single PDF document

tools.compressDesc: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.
tools.mergeDesc: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger.
tools.splitDesc: Separate one page or a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files.
tools.organizeDesc: Sort pages of your PDF file however you like. Delete PDF pages or add PDF pages to your document at will.

regex.title: Regex Tester
regex.textPlaceholder: Paste your text here to test the regex...
regex.enterPattern: Enter a regex pattern and test text to see results.

htmlValidator.title: HTML Validator
htmlValidator.description: Check your HTML for unclosed or mismatched tags.
htmlValidator.inputHint: We check tag balance and basic structure.
htmlValidator.resultsHint: Detected issues will be listed with their line and column when available.

jsonValidator.title: JSON Validator
jsonValidator.description: Check your JSON for syntax errors and structural issues.
jsonValidator.inputHint: We check for valid JSON syntax.
jsonValidator.resultsHint: Detected issues will be listed with their line and column when available.

xmlValidator.title: XML Validator
xmlValidator.description: Check your XML for syntax errors and structural issues.
xmlValidator.inputHint: We check for valid XML syntax.
xmlValidator.resultsHint: Detected issues will be listed with their line and column when available.

jsValidator.title: JavaScript Validator
jsValidator.description: Check your JavaScript code for syntax errors.
jsValidator.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type JavaScript code here...
jsValidator.inputHint: We check for valid JavaScript syntax.
jsValidator.resultsHint: Detected issues will be listed with their line and column when available.

pyValidator.title: Python Validator
pyValidator.description: Check your Python code for syntax errors.
pyValidator.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type Python code here...
pyValidator.inputHint: We check for valid Python syntax.
pyValidator.resultsHint: Detected issues will be listed with their line and column when available.

loremIpsum.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
loremIpsum.description: Generate placeholder text for your designs and mockups.
loremIpsum.startWithLoremHint: Whether to start the text with 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet'
loremIpsum.placeholder: Generated Lorem Ipsum text will appear here...

wordCounter.title: Word Counter
wordCounter.description: Count words, characters, sentences, paragraphs, and lines in your text
wordCounter.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type your text here...
wordCounter.inputHint: The text will be analyzed for word count, character count, sentences, paragraphs, and lines
wordCounter.placeholder: Enter text above and click 'Count' to see statistics

keywordExtractor.title: Keyword Extractor
keywordExtractor.description: Extract keywords from your text automatically
keywordExtractor.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type your text here...
keywordExtractor.inputHint: Keywords will be extracted from the text, excluding common stop words
keywordExtractor.placeholder: Enter text above and click 'Extract Keywords' to see results

accentRemover.title: Accent Remover
accentRemover.description: Remove accents and diacritics from text
accentRemover.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type your text with accents here...
accentRemover.inputHint: All accents and diacritics will be removed from the text
accentRemover.placeholder: Enter text above and click 'Remove Accents' to see the result

caseConverter.title: Case Converter
caseConverter.description: Convert your text between different case formats
caseConverter.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type your text here...
caseConverter.placeholder: Enter text above and select a case type to see the result

slugGenerator.title: Slug Generator
slugGenerator.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type your text here...
slugGenerator.inputHint: Text will be converted to a URL-friendly slug (lowercase, no accents, with hyphens)
slugGenerator.placeholder: Enter text above and click 'Generate Slug' to see the result
slugGenerator.info1: A slug is a URL-friendly version of text, used in web addresses.
slugGenerator.info2: Slugs are generated by removing accents, converting to lowercase, and replacing spaces with hyphens.

emailExtractor.title: Email Extractor
emailExtractor.description: Extract email addresses from your text
emailExtractor.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type your text here...
emailExtractor.inputHint: All email addresses will be extracted from the text
emailExtractor.placeholder: Enter text above and click 'Extract Emails' to see results

urlExtractor.title: URL Extractor
urlExtractor.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type your text here...
urlExtractor.inputHint: All URLs (http, https, www, ftp) will be extracted from the text
urlExtractor.placeholder: Enter text above and click 'Extract URLs' to see results

audioConvert.title: Convert Audio
audioConvert.description: Convert your audio files between different formats (MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, AAC, M4A)
audioConvert.dragDrop: Drop your audio file here or click to browse
audioConvert.bitrateHint: Bitrate for lossy formats (MP3, OGG, AAC, M4A)
audioConvert.previewPlaceholder: Upload an audio file and select a format to get started

audioCompress.title: Compress Audio
audioCompress.description: Reduce the size of your audio files by adjusting quality and bitrate
audioCompress.dragDrop: Drop your audio file here or click to browse
audioCompress.bitrateHint: Lower bitrate = smaller file but reduced quality
audioCompress.previewPlaceholder: Upload an audio file to start compression

audioMetadata.title: Audio Metadata
audioMetadata.description: Extract and view detailed metadata and ID3 tags from audio files
audioMetadata.dropFile: Drop your audio file here or click to browse
audioMetadata.noMetadata: No metadata found in this file

audioMerge.dropFiles: Drop audio files here or click to browse
audioMerge.successMessage: Your audio files have been combined into one file.

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.description: Generate QR codes from text, URLs, or any data
qrcode.dataPlaceholder: Enter text, URL, or any data to encode...
qrcode.noPreview: Enter data and click Generate to see QR code

qrcodeReader.title: QR Code Reader
qrcodeReader.description: Read and decode QR codes from images
qrcodeReader.dragDrop: Drag & drop an image or click to browse
qrcodeReader.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP, WEBP
qrcodeReader.noPreview: Upload an image containing a QR code to get started

numberConverter.title: Number Base Converter
numberConverter.description: Convert numbers between binary, decimal, hexadecimal, and octal bases
numberConverter.noResult: Enter a number and click Convert to see the result

jsonDataGenerator.title: JSON Data Generator
jsonDataGenerator.description: Generate multiple JSON objects from a template with regex patterns
jsonDataGenerator.templateHint: Use {{regex:pattern}} syntax in string values to generate random data. Example: "{{regex:\d{1,5}}}" for numbers.
jsonDataGenerator.noResult: Enter a template and click Generate to see the results

barcode.title: Barcode Generator
barcode.description: Generate barcodes (EAN, UPC, Code128, Code39, ISBN, etc.)
barcode.dataHint: Enter numbers or text depending on barcode type
barcode.addChecksumHint: Automatically add checksum digit if supported by barcode type
barcode.noPreview: Enter data and click Generate to see barcode

codeFormatter.title: Code Formatter
codeFormatter.description: Format and beautify code in multiple languages

cssMinifier.description: Minify CSS code to reduce file size

jsonMinifier.title: JSON Minifier
jsonMinifier.description: Minify JSON code to reduce file size

codeMinifier.description: Minify code in multiple languages (HTML, CSS, JS, JSON, XML)

htmlMinifier.description: Minify HTML code to reduce file size

xmlMinifier.description: Minify XML code to reduce file size

extractAudio.description: Extract audio track from video (MP4 to MP3/WAV)

merge.title: Merge Videos
merge.dropFiles: Drop video files here or click to browse
merge.successMessage: Your videos have been combined into one file.
merge.fastModeDescription: Fast mode copies video streams without re-encoding. This is very fast but requires all videos to have identical codecs, resolution, frame rate, and audio format. If videos differ, the merge may fail or produce incorrect results. Use Quality mode for automatic compatibility.

addSubtitles.title: Add Subtitles
addSubtitles.description: Add SRT/VTT subtitle files to videos

convert.title: Convert Audio
convert.description: Convert between MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG formats

metadata.description: Extract and view audio file metadata and ID3 tags

paletteGenerator.description: Generate harmonious color palettes from a base color
paletteGenerator.baseColorHint: Enter a color in HEX format (e.g., #4f46e5)
paletteGenerator.noPalette: Generate a palette to see results here

gradientGenerator.title: Gradient Generator
gradientGenerator.description: Create beautiful gradients and export as CSS, SVG, or PNG
gradientGenerator.colorWheelDescription: Click on the wheel to select a color. The lines connect the colors in your gradient.
gradientGenerator.colorWheelHelp: The lines connect the colors in order to visualize your gradient
